quote.#tail: to remove the use restriction, and for other purposes.
quote.#text: An Act to allow a certain parcel of land in Rockingham County, Virginia, to be used for a child care center

attestation-date.#text: Passed the House of Representatives November 17, 2014.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , is amended to read as follows:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: An Act to allow a certain parcel of land in Rockingham County, Virginia, to be used for a child care center
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: An Act to allow a certain parcel of land in Rockingham County, Virginia, to be used for a child care center

text.#text: Notwithstanding any restrictions in the deed, on and after the date of the enactment of this Act, the parcel comprised of approximately 3.03 acres of land transferred by the United States on April 11, 1989, to the county of Rockingham, Virginia, in deed book number 953 at page 600, together with improvements thereon may be used by the county as if the land had been transferred in fee simple with no use or other restrictions.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall take such actions as are necessary to issue a fee simple deed with no restrictions to the land described in subsection (a) to the county of Rockingham, Virginia.

text.#text: As soon as practical after the date of the enactment of this Act, the

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 5162 EH: To amend the Act entitled “An Act to allow a certain parcel of land in Rockingham County, Virginia, to be used for a child care center” to remove the use restriction, and for other purposes.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}rights.#text: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
